description:
Chocolat is a self-proclaimed servant of God who comes to http://anidb.net/ch58137 [Kanade] in order to lift the curse of absolute multiple-choice. However, she lost her memories and is of no help at all. She is such an big eater that words cannot describe. She is cute like a puppy, and has an emotional attachment to Kanade.
Source: ANN
name: Chocolat
